SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.gridgain.grover.categories
[Groovy] Class GroverCacheProjectionCategory

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grover.categories.GroverCacheProjectionCategory

@Typed
class GroverCacheProjectionCategory

Extensions for GridCacheProjection.

To access methods from the category target class has to be annotated: @Use(GroverCacheProjectionCategory).

Authors:
2012 Copyright © GridGain Systems
Version:
GridGain 4.0.3 build: 14052012

Method Detail

h2Text

static Collection h2Text(GridCacheProjection cp, GridProjection grid, Class cls, String clause)
Creates and executes ad-hoc LUCENE query on given projection returning its result. Note that if query is executed more than once (potentially with different arguments) it is more performant to create query via standard mechanism and execute it multiple times with different arguments. The analogy is similar to JDBC PreparedStatement.
Parameters:
grid - Grid projection on which this query will be executed.
cls - Query values class. Since cache can, in general, contain values of any subtype of V query needs to know the exact type it should operate on.
clause - Query H2 text clause. See GridCacheQuery for more details.
Returns:
Collection of cache key-value pairs.

Returns:
Collection of cache key-value pairs.

h2TextReduce

static R2 h2TextReduce(GridCacheProjection cp, GridProjection grid, Class cls, String clause, GroverReducer rmtRdc, GroverReducer locRdc)
Creates and executes ad-hoc LUCENE reduce query on given projection returning its result. Note that if query is executed more than once (potentially with different arguments) it is more performant to create query via standard mechanism and execute it multiple times with different arguments. The analogy is similar to JDBC PreparedStatement.
Parameters:
grid - Grid projection on which this query will be executed.
cls - Query values class. Since cache can, in general, contain values of any subtype of V query needs to know the exact type it should operate on.
clause - Query H2 text clause. See GridCacheQuery for more details.
rmtRdc - Reduce function that will be called on each remote node.
locRdc - Reduce function that will be called on local node.
Returns:
Reduced value.

args - Optional list of query arguments.

sqlRemoteReduce

static Collection sqlRemoteReduce(GridCacheProjection cp, Class cls, String clause, GroverReducer rmtRdc, Object... args)
Creates and executes ad-hoc SQL reduce query on global projection returning its result. Note that if query is executed more than once (potentially with different arguments) it is more performant to create query via standard mechanism and execute it multiple times with different arguments. The analogy is similar to JDBC PreparedStatement.
Parameters:
cls - Query values class. Since cache can, in general, contain values of any subtype of V query needs to know the exact type it should operate on.
clause - Query SQL clause. See GridCacheQuery for more details.
rmtRdc - Reduce function that will be called on each remote node.
args - Optional list of query arguments.
Returns:
Collection of reduced values.

sqlTransform

static Collection sqlTransform(GridCacheProjection cp, GridProjection grid, Class cls, String clause, GridClosure trans, Object... args)
Creates and executes ad-hoc SQL transform query on given projection returning its result. Note that if query is executed more than once (potentially with different arguments) it is more performant to create query via standard mechanism and execute it multiple times with different arguments. The analogy is similar to JDBC PreparedStatement.
Parameters:
grid - Grid projection on which this query will be executed.
cls - Query values class. Since cache can, in general, contain values of any subtype of V query needs to know the exact type it should operate on.
clause - Query SQL clause. See GridCacheQuery for more details.
trans - Transform function that will be applied to each returned value.
args - Optional list of query arguments.
Returns:
Collection of cache key-value pairs.

sqlTransform

static Collection sqlTransform(GridCacheProjection cp, Class cls, String clause, GridClosure trans, Object... args)
Creates and executes ad-hoc SQL transform query on global projection returning its result. Note that if query is executed more than once (potentially with different arguments) it is more performant to create query via standard mechanism and execute it multiple times with different arguments. The analogy is similar to JDBC PreparedStatement.
Parameters:
cls - Query values class. Since cache can, in general, contain values of any subtype of V query needs to know the exact type it should operate on.
clause - Query SQL clause. See GridCacheQuery for more details.
trans - Transform function that will be applied to each returned value.
args - Optional list of query arguments.
Returns:
Collection of cache key-value pairs.
